testimonial.description: Dorothy was amazing to work with. She communicated cleary through the whole process and really made an effort to understand exactly what we wanted. She worked thourougly, but succintly. I will definitely be using her again.

Dorothy is truly an amazing designer. Her communication throughout the whole process was impeccable. She went above and beyond our expectations and returned an amazing product. My company will be using her again,

Dorothy was great to work with. I appreciated her communication throught the whole process to ensure she got exactly what we needed. She had amazing ideas to help us optimize our site for SEO and better our user experience.
